channel.title: Bad teeth:p
channel.description:
How many of you have bad teeth?
My teeth are ****** becouse of candy and not brushing( i started brushing like in 7th grade but it was already to late)
With all of my adult teeth i have aroung 17 cavities still like 7 i have to get done all back teeth (top/bottom) are screwed and my from teeth 3 have pretty big holes
also i need braces( cant get till all cavities are done :P
I am terrified of the dentist i ran away 2 times and walked home WALKED HOME!! but after they got rotten to the root i was running there :P :P
any one else with really fudged up teeth

Take care of your mouth dude. bad hygiene is the easiest way to scare off a chick.

item.title: Bad teeth:p
item.dc:creator: @Tempest_Gaia Tempest Gaia
item.description:
@Tempest_Gaia wrote:

Aha, I had braces on for 2 years, until grade 6-ish. The worst part, was because there were only two brackets, on my two upper front teeth But my pearly whites are still pearly white. I’m in grade 9 now, and it’s important to keep brushing… I just stopped for a bit, for lack of time/memory. But now that I’ve started brushing consistantly and thoroughly, they are perfect again :P.

Read full topic

I probably need braces as my top set of teeth isn’t aligned with the bottom set. Also I have one crooked tooth, but that’s because when I was little my brother told me to twist it out of my mouth. I did it.

item.title: Bad teeth:p
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

[quote=“Acrodox, post:25, topic:369416”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=465546.msg3405839#msg3405839 date=1290303287]

fake teeth? wow, my teeth are really white.

A lot of people have fake teeth actually… My one front tooth is partially fake from being smacked in the face with a Tennis racket, which chipped like half of the tooth off.

I have pretty white teeth, but the only problem I have is bad breath, even though I brush my teeth twice a day for at least 2 minutes. Still trying to find a good fix for this :\ Gum helps while I’m chewing it, but I can’t live with a stick of gum in my mouth.
[/quote]

SAME EXACT PROBLEM[/quote]

Nice breathe, you tramps.

LolJoke.

How many of you have bad teeth?

My teeth are ****** becouse of candy and not brushing( i started brushing like in 7th grade but it was already to late)

With all of my adult teeth i have aroung 17 cavities still like 7 i have to get done all back teeth (top/bottom) are screwed and my from teeth 3 have pretty big holes

also i need braces( cant get till all cavities are done

I am terrified of the dentist i ran away 2 times and walked home WALKED HOME!!
but after they got rotten to the root i was running there

any one else with really fudged up teeth

Go to bed with Cola in your mouth.

Read full topic

item.title: Bad teeth:p
item.dc:creator: @lotto320 lotto320
item.description:
@lotto320 wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:4, topic:369416”]Mix some baking soda with water, add a little mint flavoring, mix it up until its nice and creamy, then put it on your tooth brush and clean your teeth. Get some peroxide, gargle, spit it out, and rinse with cold water.

There’s more than enough benefits to this:

  • you save money
  • no fluoride
  • just as good, but healthier, and better.

And for fresh breath, just chew some gum.[/quote]

Laughed my *** off when u said just chew some gum

Read full topic

item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Jme, just use white-strips after you brush, in two weeks you’ll have white teeth

Anyways, I have good teeth right now, not sparkling white, but white, straight, only thing is I have braces on my top teeth because I’m having my front teeth redone and they need support(they are fake)

Read full topic

item.title: Bad teeth:p
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Sleeping with my mouth open seems to damage them. I find I wake up in the morning and my mouth is disgustingly dry and crispy lol. Everything just cakes right in I find. Well, that and smoking + insane amounts of coffee

I brush minimum twice a day, for at least 2 minutes. And I use listerine when we have it. But I find they are still more yellow than I’d like, and very pointy and sharp at the front. It’s unfortunate because girls often notice bad teeth right away!

I think I’m just self concious though. It’s no where near as bad as a lot of others.

Read full topic
